name: Empty Lab
description:
Empty Lab

I made this game while I was in quarantine and doing distance education under the coronavirus pandemic. This is my first fully completed project.

The Game

You have to defeat the virus in an abandoned laboratory by interacting with items in the game.

Controls:

  • Movement: W A S D
  • Pick up item: F
  • Use item: Left Mouse Button (Click on the icon)

Have fun!

Used programs:

  • Unity, C#
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Aseprite, Photoshop (Art)
  • Audacity (Sound Effects)
  • Search Results (Music

--
